mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.user_no, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, u.user_nickname FROM board b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY b.board_no ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{listsize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachments (board_no, file_name, file_size, file_type, file_path, created_at) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, NOW());
